properties.name: pitaya.auth.access.expiration
properties.description: JWT access token expiration time in ms

properties.name: pitaya.auth.refresh.expiration
properties.description: JWT refresh token expiration time in ms

properties.name: pitaya.auth.refresh.deletionRate
properties.description: The interval in ms with which expired refresh tokens get deleted

properties.name: pitaya.sse.eviction.rate
properties.description: The interval in ms with which stale SSE endpoints are evicted

properties.name: pitaya.sse.eviction.threshold
properties.description: A threshold above which evicition is done. SSE endpoints will only be evicted once at least that many emitters have been removed.
